name: 3D FPV Motorcycle Racing PRO - Full eXtrem Version
name_original: 3D FPV Motorcycle Racing PRO - Full eXtrem Version
description:
** THIS VERSION HAS NO IN GAME ADS **

Get ready for an eXtreme adrenaline pumping Motorcycle FPV racing game!

Blast through traffic with helmet-cam view as you accelerate for more points. Race against the police and avoid speed traps. Earn money and upgrade your bike. Buy new bikes. Race across a huge map in different stages both day and night.

Features:
-12 stages in total
-15 motorcycles
-Selectable colors
-Fully upgradable bikes
-6 different game modes including police chase
